Package com.krobothsoftware.commons.network

Provides HTTP request methods through NetworkHelper class

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CookieManager
    CookieManager stores, and sends HTTP Cookies through HttpURLConnection.
    NetworkHelper
    Helper class for creating, and retrieving data from HttpURLConnection
    RequestBuilder
    Builder for requesting HTTP connections.
    Response
    Response holder from RequestBuilder.execute(NetworkHelper).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NetworkHelper.Method
    HTTP Methods used for connections
